class.name: pr2_interactive_manipulation/CameraFocusFrontend
class.description: (NEW) Allows the user to focus the 3D camera at pre-defined locations.

class.name: pr2_interactive_manipulation/InteractiveManipulationFrontend
class.description: Allows the user to request and assist with manipulation tasks.

class.name: pr2_interactive_manipulation/PointHeadCamera
class.description: Displays an image from a camera, with the visualized world rendered behind it. A click into the display window will make the robot look in that direction.

class.name: pr2_interactive_manipulation/PublishClickCamera
class.description: Displays an image from a camera, with the visualized world rendered behind it. A click into the display window publish the coordinates of the point on a specified topic.
